movie.name: Insidious
movie.summary: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

movie.name: Piranhaconda
movie.summary: Two piranha/anaconda hybrid creatures hunt down the scientist who stole their egg and a film crew; making a slasher film in the jungle.

movie.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movie.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movie.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
movie.summary: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

movie.name: Sausage Party
movie.summary: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

movie.name: Toy Story
movie.summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movie.name: Logan
movie.summary: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

movie.name: Shutter Island
movie.summary: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movie.name: The Shining
movie.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

movie.name: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid
movie.summary: There's a crisis in the Florida Everglades as giant pythons are threatening the alligator population.

movie.name: Forrest Gump
movie.summary: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

movie.name: Pretty Woman
movie.summary: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

movie.name: The 40 Year Old Virgin
movie.summary: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother

movie.name: The Lion King
movie.summary: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

movie.name: The Dark Knight
movie.summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movie.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movie.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movie.name: The Conjuring
movie.summary: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movie.name: Frankenfish
movie.summary: When the body of a man is found completely destroyed in the swamps in Louisiana, the medical investigator Sam Rivers is assigned to investigate the murder.

movie.name: Schindler's List
movie.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

movie.name: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
movie.summary: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

movie.name: The Hangover
movie.summary: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

movie.name: Finding Nemo
movie.summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movie.name: The Avengers
movie.summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movie.name: Seven
movie.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
